excess a local servering running on localhost port 2222, user name is john, with password geronimo, home dir is /home/john and os is ubuntu, list all the contents in the home directory of the server, and download all the files that start with the letter a
for this command i want to save the files in the current directory, how should i change the command scp -r -P 2222 john@localhost:/home/john/a* /path/to/local/directory
please help me set the permissions for wow.sh to 755
copy the wow.sh script to the server i previously mention, and show the output of it running on the server

To copy the wow.sh script to the server:
```
scp -P 2222 wow.sh john@localhost:/home/john/
```

To show the output of it running on the server:
```
ssh john@localhost -p 2222 './wow.sh'
```
